Document:
[color=#ffff00][head=3]Section 8: End-of-Round (EOR) and Evacuation[/head][/color] [color=#a4885c]8.1[/color] Evac should be called or recalled based on either general public consensus, or under whether a major, serious emergency is being deemed as solvable or not. Forcefully calling or recalling without reasonable urgency, emergency or need is not allowed.
[color=#a4885c]8.2[/color] Antagonists are not allowed to call nor recall evac to accomplish their objectives.
